product_name: Amphipod SnapFlask Hydration Module - 8 oz. - Package of 2
long_description: Upgrade the hydration performance of your pack or Amphipod belt with these easy-access SnapFlask bottles that each hold 8 oz. of your favorite performance fluid. SnapFlask module technology features squeeze-easy release and snap-in replacement to the docking base (included) for effortless access. Docking base/module attaches securely to Amphipod belts and any 1.5 to 2 in. wide belt or strap on a backpack or waistpack. Docking base allows vertical or horizontal attachment positions. Each flask has a wide, 35mm mouth that makes it easy to fill and clean. Includes two 8 fl. oz. bottles for a total of 16 fl. oz. Polyethylene is 100% BPA free.
short_description: Upgrade the hydration performance of your pack or Amphipod belt with these easy-access SnapFlask bottles that each hold 8 oz. of your favorite performance fluid.
